altername_name: Bare Knuckle III - the Game of Death Mod II
BK3 - the Game of Death II
name: Bare Knuckle III: The Game of Death II
overview: This mod allows the player to choose Bruce Lee, the iconic super star and martial artist, in the classic game Bare Knuckle III (Streets of Rage 3). The mod is based on the English translation of the Japanese version of the game. The translation was released by Twilight Translations.
